subject: Re: [junit] Testing Native calls
msgSnippet: ... What specifically is giving you troubles?  How is it different from testing Java code that doesn t rely on native code? ... Mike Clark Clarkware
messageBody:
On Jan 4, 2005, at 2:56 PM, y_shenhar wrote:

> I am writing a java library that needs to make native calls.
> I would appreciate ideas on how to unit test the Java code (assuming
> that the native code works).

What specifically is giving you troubles? How is it different from
testing Java code that doesn't rely on native code?

---
Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
